definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: Souba, rarely Swba(l): an Aramaean kingdom, time of (Saul and) David [[אֲרַם חוֹבָא]] 2Sa 10:6, 2Sa 10:8 (elsewhere [[חוֹבָה]]), [[אֲרַם חוֹבָה]] Ps 60:2 (title); ´[[הֲדַדְעֶזֶר מֶלֶח ח]] 2Sa 8:3, 2Sa 8:5, 2Sa 8:12 = 1Ch 18:3, 1Ch 18:5, 1Ki 11:23, 1Ch 18:9; ´[[ח]] also 1Ch 19:6; ´[[חֲמַת ח]] 2Ch 8:3; orig. home of one of David's heroes 2Sa 23:36 (perh. rd. also for n.pr.m. [[מִבְחָר]] ‖ 1Ch 11:38, cf. Dr); ´[[מַלְכֵי ח]] 1Sa 14:47 (only here in Saul's time); Nö:ARAM, in Ency. Bib., cf. ZMG xxv (1871), 113 ff. places between Hamath and Demascus (about Ḥums, Emesa), and so Dl:Pa 279 f., who cp. As. city Ṣubitu, cf. Schr:COT. 2Sa 8:8.
